states.name: owncloud
states.description: Store your files, calendar events and contacts in a private dropbox. Access them from web, mobile or use a desktop sync software

states.name: vpn
states.description: Create private connection between offices and data centers and access work environment from home.

states.name: directory
states.description: Active Directory server for centralized users and groups management. Use single password for all services.

states.name: email
states.description: Mail server with web interface and support for all popular mail clients.

states.name: backup
states.description: Create automatic daily and weekly backups of all critical data across the network.

states.name: proxy
states.description: Filter web traffic by rules and categories. Make different policies for VIP users.

states.name: fileshare
states.description: Fileshare server for storing and sharing data. Manage priviledeges per user and groups.

states.name: monitoring
states.description: Monitoring critical parameters for each server (Linux or Windows) and network devices. Support creating custom sensors.
